name: Space Explorer (Green Shape)
description:
Fight alien creatures, destroy enemy space ships and reach the end of each level to win! There are only 6 levels, but you enable a Hard Mode after beating the final boss. Collect items to increase your score.

This was made for the Lost Cartridge Jam 2021. It is a platformer that emulates the feel of an NES game.

Controls:

Left and Right arrows: Movement.

X: Jump.

Z: Shoot.

Credits:

Pixel NES font made by: Neale Davidson

https://fonts2u.com/pixel-nes.font

Music and Sound Effects made with: Bosca Ceoil

https://boscaceoil.net/
